QuestData.Title: Foolish Endeavors
QuestData.Description: This is madness. How do they expect us to take on a Scourge necrolord and an unknown number of his minions?$B$B<Getry sighs.>$B$BIf Ickoris sent you he must think that you are capable of great feats. Perhaps you will call down a miracle today, eh?$B$BWhen you're ready we will descend and face Varidus.$B$BIf we make it out of this mess in one piece, report back to Hellscream in Warsong Hold.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Getry defeat Varidus the Flenser at Warsong Farms.$B$BReport to Garrosh Hellscream should you succeed.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Garrosh Hellscream at Warsong Hold in Borean Tundra.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Hellscream raises an eyebrow at you.>$B$BWhat's this I hear about a Scourge necrolord?
QuestData.RewardText: And you returned victorious, just as I thought! I told Saurfang you'd be fine.$B$B<Hellscream grunts knowingly.>$B$BPerhaps this will show that old dog that he doesn't have all the answers, eh?
